Package filesprocessing.filters

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AllFilter
    a filter class that let all the files pass
    BetweenFilter
    a filter class the filters file by a given range between two numbers
    ContainsFilter
    a filter class the filters file if given value is contained in the file name
    ExecutableFilter
    a filter class the filters file if given file is executable
    Filter
    A Filter abstract class
    FilterFactory
    a class factory that creates filter object according to the commendfile
    FilterFile
    Class FilterFile -
    GreaterThenFilter
    GreaterThanFilter class - filters according to which filter has greater size.
    HiddenFilter
    HiddenFilter class - checks if a file is hidden or not.
    PrefixFilter
    PrefixFilter class - checks if a file's prefix matches a certain given prefix.
    SmallerThanFilter
    SmallerThanFilter class - checks if the file's size is smaller than a certain value
    SuffixFilter
    SuffixFilter class - checks if a file has a certain suffix.
    WritableFilter
    WritableFilter - checks if a file is writable or not.
